|rad3correv = |rad3cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://ec2-54-202-251-7.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8080/index.asp WebUI Demo] ''ROG Rapture Wireless-AC5300 Tri-Band Gaming Router'' :''Best solution for VR gaming and 4K streaming'' FCC certification for the GT-AC5300 was achieved via Class II Permissive Change (C2PC) request on January 30, 2017 to the same entry that was used for the [[ASUS RT-AC5300]] (MSQ-RTGZ00) despite the hardware differences. {{WiFiCert|WFA70211|02/10/2017}} {{see also|ASUS RT-AC5300|Arcadyan}} ==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://press.asus.com/PressReleases/p/ASUS-Republic-of-Gamers-Announces-Complete-Gaming-Lineup-at-CES-2017 ''ASUS ROG Announces Complete Gaming Lineup at CES 2017'' on '''ASUS'''] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33110-asus-rog-rapture-gt-ac5300-wireless-ac5300-tri-band-gaming-router-reviewed ''ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AC5300 Gaming Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-rog-rapture-gt-ac5300-review ''ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AC5300 Router'' on '''DigitalCitizen'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/asus/rog-rapture-gt-ac5300/ ''ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AC5300 '' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) *[https://3dnews.ru/958143 ''ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AC5300 '' on '''3DNews'''] (RU) ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/upcoming-asus-rog-…-gt-ac5300.36665/ ''ASUS ROG GT-AC5300 Gaming Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] *[http://vip.asus.com/forum/topic.aspx?board_id=11&model=GT-AC5300&SLanguage=en-us ''ASUS ROG GT-AC5300'' on '''ASUS VIP''' official forums] *[https://forums.whirlpool.net.au/forum-replies.cfm?t=2597500 ''ASUS ROG GT-AC5300'' on '''Whirlpool''' forums] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1737-asus-rog-rapture-gt-ac5300/ ''ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AC5300'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-102496-1-1.html ''Asus GT-AC5300 Review'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] (PCB REV 1.41 images) :*CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4908KFEBG @1.8GHz (ARM) ::- LAN1/LAN2 (Gaming, QoS prio), LAN5/LAN6 (Link Aggregation) :*Flash: ''ESMT'' F59L2G81A-25T - 256MB (NAND) :*RAM: 2x ''Nanya'' [http://www.nanya.com/tw/Product/3888/NT5CC256M16DP-DI NT5CC256M16DP-DI] - 512MB (DDR3) :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm4366e BCM4366EKMMLG] 4x4 802.11n SoC ::- 4x [[Skyworks]] SE2623L - 2.4GHz Power Amplifier (32dBm) ::- 4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85201-11 - 2.4GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA :*5GHz radio: 2x [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm4366e BCM4366EKMMLG] 4x4 802.11ac SoC ::- 8x [[RFMD]] RFPA5542 - 5GHz Power Amplifier Module ::- 8x [[Skyworks]] SKY85614-11 - 5GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA :*Switch: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/ethernet-connectivity/switch-fabric/bcm53134 BCM53134S] - LAN3/LAN4, LAN7/LAN8 ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_gt-ac5300 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = bcm4908 |subtarget = generic |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_2.4ghz WiFi 2.4GHz], [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_5ghz WiFi 5GHz] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Notes== ===Misc=== *[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s889428 PR on '''Broadcom'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/8862/quantenna-maintains-80211ac-technology-lead-as-broadcom-and-marvell-launch-new-chipsets PR on '''AnandTech'''] ===Features=== *'''Rule the network''' – ROG Gaming Center keeps tabs on all the important :gaming stuff, such as lag, traffic stats and device connections. *'''Instant gaming optimization''' – ROG Game Boost and Gaming Ports :intelligently prioritize gaming traffic. *'''PC-grade CPU''' – Unrivaled quad-core processing power for ultimate :network performance. *'''Front-line network security''' :– Neutralize internet threats before they hit your network. *'''Battle-ready hardware''' – Game-winning tri-band 802.11ac Wi-Fi, :with 8x Gigabit LAN ports for wired devices and 2x USB 3.0 ports. *'''Supports''': Dual WAN, IPTV support, Link Aggregation (802.3ad), :MU-MIMO, Airtime Fairness, Roaming Assist, Guest Network, :Smart Connect, Traffic Analyzer, Adaptive QoS, AiProtection, :Parental Control, Network service filter, URL filter, Port filter, :Mac OS Backup, Enhanced media server (AiPlayer app comp.), :AiCloud personal cloud service, AiDisk file server, :Download Master, 3G/4G data sharing, Printer Server ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-infrastructure/bcm49408 BCM4908] @1.8 GHz Quad Core (ARM Cortex-B53) *WLAN: 2x 4T4R AC [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm4366e BCM4366E] + 1x 4T4R N [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm4366e BCM4366E] @800 MHz :WiSoC (ARM Cortex-A7), 4x4 Wave2 MU-MIMO, 40/80MHz, QAM1024 :DualBand, acqam, 5GHz (2x 2167Mbps), 2.4GHz (1000Mbps) *Power Supply: AC Input: 110~240V (50/60 Hz) :DC Output: 19V with max. 3.42A current *Dimensions: 245 mm x 245 mm x 65 mm (WxDxH) (without bezel) *Weight: 1880 g ===Spec. aggregators=== *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/3838 On '''Speedguide'''] *[https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=1769 On '''Whirlpool'''] ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info >> • |
export HND-94908_BASE := HND_ROUTER=y PROFILE="94908HND"

export GT-AC5300 := $(HND-94908_BASE)
export GT-AC5300 += BUILD_NAME="GT-AC5300" SWITCH2="BCM53134" NVSIZE="128" 
  DHDAP=y DPSTA=n LACP=y WTFAST=y DISABLE_REPEATER_UI=y IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y 
  ARM=y AUTODICT=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y MEDIASRV=y 
  MODEM=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y WEBDAV=y SMARTSYNCBASE=y 
  USB="USB" APP="installed" PROXYSTA=y DNSMQ=y SHP=n BCMWL6=y BCMWL6A=y 
  TUNEK="n" DISK_MONITOR=y BTN_WIFITOG=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y LED_BTN=y 
  BCMSMP=y XHCI=y DUALWAN=y  USER_LOW_RSSI=y OPENVPN=y TIMEMACHINE=y MDNS=y 
  VPNC=y BRCM_NAND_JFFS2=y JFFS2LOG=y BWDPI=y DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y LINUX_MTD="64" 
  DEBUGFS=y TEMPROOTFS=y SSH=y EMAIL=y SYSSTATE=y ROG=y STAINFO=y CLOUDCHECK=y 
  NATNL_AICLOUD=y JFFS2USERICON=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y MULTICASTIPTV=y QUAGGA=y 
  WLCLMLOAD=n BCM_MUMIMO=y LAN50=y ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y CFEZ=y ETLAN_LED=y 
  TFAT=y NTFS="tuxera" HFS="tuxera" NEWSSID_REV2=y LAN4WAN_LED=y NEW_APP_ARM=y 
  VISUALIZATION=y BONDING=y NETOOL=y TRACEROUTE=y FORCE_AUTO_UPGRADE=y
}} ==See also== *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[ASUS GT-AC9600]] (ROG Rapture Aura 10G) - ''AC9600 Wi-Fi Gaming Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTG03H MSQ-RTG03H], IC ID: 3568A-RTG03H, PSU: 19V/3.42A *[[ASUS RT-AC5300]] - ''AC5300 Wireless Tri-Band Gigabit Router'' • [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC5300/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-AC3200]] - ''AC3200 Tri-Band Gigabit Wi-Fi Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC3200/ PPage] *[[ASUS PCE-AC88]] - ''AC3100 Dual-Band PCIe Wi-Fi Adapter'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/PCE-AC88/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC87]] - ''AC2600 Wireless Dual-Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC87/ PPage] {{ASUS AC products}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
